Text:
How do i convert the Video_TS folder to an ISO?
I use Imgburn, but i can't convert it into an iso.

I get a error message that i really don't understand. Something about sectors and filesizes.

It's watchable, but the volume in the movie goes up and down by each chapter. Help me someone?

Usually i can, but this time i can't.

I think maybe it's because there's no "Audio_TS" folder. There always are when i manage to convert them into Iso.
So don't tell me that i can't :P
